Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored after seven seconds for Germany before they doubled their lead early in the second half through Kai Havertz
Pre-Game Insights: Kylian Mbappe expects better from France after ‘warning’ served ahead of Euros
Mbappe said he expected some hostility from Marseille fans while playing for the national team
Post-Match Reflections: Mbappe said: ‘We have to realise that if we play like this in the matches that lie ahead, we could be in for a big disappointment, and we don’t want that to happen to us’
Miscellaneous Highlights: France host Chile at the Stade Velodrome
Others: France were beaten 2-0 by Germany in a set-back ahead of this summer’s tournament
